- that stop tons of bitches.

Second of all, stop fucking in public tax property.  You fuck in school, you ass gonna get criminal actions and criminal acts on you.

@user_A_exist. u said it.
Typical plot with braindead FMC and Ultra dense to the point of retarted MC.
Its been a few months now. WHERE'S THE DAMN THREESOME
This girl is so fckin dumb
Muehehehehehe i cant wait for the threesome hehehehehe it will be epic fr.
Need to be translated quickly....
please for english translation and another part
I need english version please!!!
I swear to God if I see the author out there on the street, I will beat the shit pit of you.
Ngl dis comment section got me taking out some popcorn while reading XD

@Netorinoceros I think you're intentionally of bad faith just because you wanna talk and it makes the whole conversation pretty boring, I've read dozens of NTR in this website and I know what I've seen, if you wanna keep on imagining things you do you it's alright I couldn't care less.

Is the art style and level of details that make the villain here look more pretty boy and not the super asshole looks compared to typical villains. That doesn't make him more handsome, a bad photo of a handsome guy doesn't make that guy ugly.

'Handsome' and 'Beautiful' is not the same and if you not retarded you should know that already, to qualify as 'Handsome' you really only need an average face but well build a body which let faces it, shit ton of NTR doujin villains have this trait... the only reason you people don't give these villains a fair judgment is that they're the villain... and you guy were busy self-insert the cuck.  It a fucking joke when you guy literally doesn't consider a shit ton of villains out there 'handsome' just because the artist doesn't give them eyes or properly shade...  Quote " It is rare that the bad guy in NTR series is a handsome guy and not a big, fat old man."  which is retarded sentence since I can just press NTR tag right now and find plenty... but I guess you can't be handsome just because you're black/tan according to a certain person... Also, here's a good one, is Saitama from One Punch Man ugly because they drawing him like 5 years old drawing for the funny scene?

This one is weak, like the girl is so easy and dumb that it is not even fun, I love NTR but just like I don't like the ones that include mind control because it ruins the fun, I also don't like this one that are so cartonish that just breaks the immersion. Maby I'm getting it wrong but first she gets blackmailed for a book??? Like a misunderstanding that can be so easily resolved with no repercussion. And then did she seriously believed that that photo of them together was prove of here boyfriend cheating??? wtf at least have some creativity hahah
The guy below me nailed it. Well it is maybe too hard for an idiot to get it i guess

@Netorinoceros Nah he's right. They may not all be fat but they're definitely not attractive. It's very very rare to have a guy with beautiful face in NTR.

I read a lot of NTR and I could probably count the times I've seen a handsome face on the fingers of my hands
the comment section is always the best part of netorare :3

Because you so retarded... you even answered yourself in what you just wrote... is not so 'rare' now isn't when you can say have to say "lot" and "many". Your idea of handsome is basically a dude who just happen to not look black/tan chad. "About this Doujin" you so retarded and butthurt that your line of thinking is shrinking to the size of tiny penis... it applies to general you dumbass. If you truely look at other NTR Doujinshi villain you'll find them equally if not more 'handsome' but I guess that's would be impossible since you too busy self insert as the cuck and didn't even noticed the villain that's not fat or old.
Cant wait for threesome

@Netorinoceros And how did that prove me i didn't look at the content inside ? Hum ? Did i write something that is wrong about this doujin ? Combo NTR + big, fat old man is one of the most easiest to see setups in NTR, many villains are normal, a lot of are chad but also a lot of them never get drawn properly, just a face, a mouth, a nose and done. It is rare to a see doujin that actually emphasize the charm, handsome face of the villains, make you reader actually notice that "oh, this guys is quite handsome". That is all.

Prove? Press Netorare tag right now and see how many fat old man you see... and tell me how 'rare' is it to see handsome villain. Unless you so delusional that the villain is not considered handsome just because he look like Chad.
@Netorinoceros shut up retard. Prove me wrong ! It seems you can't even read "part" and "chapter".
The comment below me is retarded and clearly didn't even look at the content inside
So part 3 he will eat the Nicoru girl, part 4 3some. Can't wait..........! It is rare that the bad guy in NTR series is a handsome guy and not a big, fat old man.
